allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-agent Claude Code workflow system

Implements an automated PR workflow with two Claude Code agents:
- Coder agent: implements GitHub issues and creates PRs
- Reviewer agent: reviews code and provides feedback

Components:
- GitHub Actions workflows for event triggers
- Dockerized agents with Claude Code CLI
- n8n workflow templates for orchestration
- Safeguards: 5-iteration limit + 24h timeout
EOF
\)")
